backend/main.mo: Defines data types and in-memory state for jobs, candidates, interviews, clients, and user profiles, with access control and basic profile/job APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items mapping implemented UI and components to feature requirements with metadata and file references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides brief descriptions of various frontend files, mainly React pages and global styling, used for build documentation.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that loads the React app and sets favicon and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, authentication gating, route tree, and layout rendering for the entire React app.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Simple UI screen informing users they lack permissions, with navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, user menu, role display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with header, sidebar, main content area, and footer structure.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Provides main navigation sidebar with route-aware highlighting and icon-based links.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Protects content by checking Internet Identity auth and profile loading before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty-state component showing illustration, message, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: A dialog component that collects name and email, then saves the user's profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines structured React Query keys for profiles, roles, jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login state, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider around the app.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateC: Form page for creating a new candidate, validating inputs and submitting via createCandidate API before redirecting to the detail view.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateD: Displays detailed candidate info including status, contact details, and related job opening, with navigation to edit.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateE: Form page for editing an existing candidate, preloading data, validating inputs, and updating via updateCandidate API.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/Candidates: Lists all candidates with search, status filtering, and delete actions, linking to create and detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientCreateP: Form page for creating a new client with validation and submission through createClient API, redirecting to the client detail page.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientDetailP: Displays detailed client info with status, notes, contact details, and navigation to editing.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientEditPag: Provides a form to edit an existing client, handling validation and update submission.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientsListPa: Shows a searchable, filterable list of clients with actions to view, edit, or delete entries.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing counts of jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients with navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewC: Form for scheduling a new interview, validating inputs and creating an interview record.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewD: Displays interview details, including status, type, candidate info, and outcome notes.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewE: Loads an interview, populates a form, validates input, and submits updates to the interview.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/Interviews: Displays all interviews with status filtering and supports navigation and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobCreatePage.ts: Provides a form to create a new job opening, validating fields and submitting to the API.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobDetailPage.ts: Shows detailed information about a job opening, including client info and status.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobEditPage.tsx: Loads an existing job, fills an editable form, validates changes, and submits updates.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobsListPage.tsx: React page that lists job openings with search, status filtering, navigation, and delete confirmation logic.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that triggers Internet Identity authentication with a styled UI layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, assets, and current state for the Tyagi Chef app.
